website_summaries.verdict: Possessing the right blend of features and design, the G3 finally gives LG the right phone with which to challenge Korean rival Samsung.
pros: The LG G3 has solid call quality and LTE data speeds, a great camera, a brilliantly sharp display, a snappy quad-core processor, and a flat UI that makes Android 4.4 look good
LG's flagship has also improved on the previous model -- the new G3 comes with a removable battery and microSD card slot, both things the G2 lacked
cons: The new QHD display with its 2,560x1,440-pixel resolution is quite a power hog, so the phone will barely last you a day without a charge

customer_reviews.title: So, we bought this phone as "NEW" from this ...
customer_reviews.text: So, we bought this phone as "NEW" from this seller for my our Daughter for Christmas in 2016. Long story short, my phone (same one) quit working so I am now using this one. I took it to a repair shop to replace glass and they told me that it was clearly a refurbished phone, insert anger! I am so irritated that people can do this, sell something as NEW that is NOT! We paid NEW price and get a refurbished phone. This is so wrong and quite frankly pisses me off! Make sure you research and know who you are buying from and what you are actually paying for!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: It worked great initially, and I did accidentally drop it a few times. A week ago, out of nowhere, the wifi connection refuses to work reliably. So, must move onto a new phone. Wish that it would last longer. I bought it because the battery is replaceable. I did replace the battery once, but if wifi antenna was so unreliable, the entire phone is of no use. The ability to replace battery is not that important. I googled the issue, and it seems to not be rare.
customer_reviews.author: Pathfinderprobe

customer_reviews.title: Be careful. Useless after one year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a year, but after a year the battery died. So, I had to buy new batteries and thought that I would not have any more problems. However, I was wrong. Just 2 months after, the screen started fading and flickering. So, I tried different methods from the internet to solve but nothing worked. I know many LG G3 users who have had similar problems. Therefore, I do not recommend anyone to buy this phone. Two stars for one year of relatively good experience with some overheating and short battery life issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bushra@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I am a software engineer. I am also very experienced with cell phones. This phone is not a new d855. It is a different motherboard packaged in a d855 shell. It's modified to show that it's a d855 in the settings but the one I received was an ls990 (Sprint). These aren't just refurbished, they have been refurbished (bad chips fixed with a shoddy reflow of the board) but they are also modified to appear to be something they are not. Do not purchase. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: ATT

customer_reviews.title: now phone less
customer_reviews.text: phone had a problem with the mother board it started going dark screen from day one i taught it just need a change of battery but after replacing the battery it worked well for a wile and started going dark screen once again then after a month or so it never got back its display you can hear its on but u cant see noting but black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked fine for the first two months. Then I started having problems with the WIFI mode. The phone LG3 WIFI had a mind of its own turning on and off constantly and not working properly. I checked the internet to try to solve the problem but I found out the LG3 model had several issues dealing with its WIFI connection malfunctions.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: as I went to a T-Mobile store to get a phone rather than take a chance to end up with another crappy phone.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got it and was setting up the phone, I notice the some letters on the keyboard don't work. I don't know if it was a software or screen issue, but returned it right away. Didn't get a replacement, as I went to a T-Mobile store to get a phone rather than take a chance to end up with another crappy phone.
customer_reviews.author: njbubu

customer_reviews.title: Rebooting problem of LG phones strikes again.
customer_reviews.text: My second attempt at a new phone, and again, very nice feel, features and appearance. Start up was easy, data transfer a snap. Noticed that it kept rebooting but hey, it's new to me. Went to get the SIM card set up, it rebooted continuously in the store and never even got to the carrier page. Then it shut down completely and despite numerous tries to restart, it never came to life again. Returning it, RIP.
customer_reviews.author: Beth E.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in quite a while
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in quite a while. Love it way more than that S5 I replaced, So much less bloatware and so much more upgradeability I feel sort of stupid for not doing more research before I went with the S5... anyway I'm glad I broke the screen on the S5 due to the fact that its glued in and hard to service unlike this gem of a smartphone that is so serviceable and tuneable, perfect for a guy like me who likes to open things up and see what makes them tick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty disappointed in this phone. Its works well overall most days. However the battery overheats and it randomly shuts off, lately its been a couple times a day. Also, i havent even had it a year and some spots on the touch screen no longer respond to touch. Right after i got it i was having battery issues and the company did send me a new one but it still has issues. I am starting to look for a new phone, and ot hasn't even been a year with this one. Which is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mulder

customer_reviews.title: ... for my brother via Amazon and it turned out great. But when I tried to do the same ...
customer_reviews.text: About two years ago I bought this phone for my brother via Amazon and it turned out great. But when I tried to do the same for my wife this Xmas, my experience was the opposite. The phone kept rebooting and getiing stuck in the start up screen. Completely useless. Maybe this particular phone was just defective. That;s probably it since my brother's phone still works great to this day. But I can't in good consience recomend this phone anymore. I ended up sending it back and buying her the LG K10 instead. The build is very similar and the size is opretty much the same. RIP LG G3, you were a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Craviotto

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust this seller. The phone I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust this seller. The phone I ordered evidently had the digitizer replaced. The lights from the display can be seen on the sides. The battery percentage jumps from 10% to 0%. It also overheats. it came with the old android software. On the bottom, you can see the back arrow, the home icon and the barred settings icon instead of a triangle, a circle and a square. I am about to print the return label and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis J. Zarraga N

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this phone at first
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this phone at first. I bought it in December of 2016 and by March of 2017 I started having issues with it. The device restarts by itself and has recently started to flicker and the screen fades randomly when in use. My phone has never been dropped but I recently noticed that my screen has started to rise from both sides of the phone. I am honestly dissatisfied as my tech guy has told me that there is nothing he can do as it isnt a problem with the motherboard but a manufacturing issue as he has seen many similar cases. The G series is not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: i was tricked with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone in december of the last year and first it came almost two weeks later than it was espected and then i used it just two and a half weeks because it wasn't working. One day it just turn off by itself and when i tried to turn it on it don't pass the LG logo in the turn on process. I take it to almost every store in my city but no one could fix it. Im really pissed off. I've tried everithing and nothin happens. I really want this phone back because i spend all my money for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: virgilio fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived on time and as described. No issues connecting it to straightalk service. Was a little larger than i expected but I'm getting used to it. Excellent display and camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scarafia

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. I purchased this phone and use the ptel mobile MVNO for service. I couldn't be happier. This phone rivals all of its competitors but for a reasonable price. The screen is the perfect size and fits in my pocket with ease. The picture is brilliant too. I prefer the android environment to iOS and this phone has proven to be a great addition to my environment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DriscollTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Works with Straight Talk in the U. S. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works with Straight Talk in the U.S. You need a SIM card, such as a 'bring your own phone' SIM for it. Unlike every other ST phone I have had, THIS ONE BROADCASTS A WIFI HOTSPOT for use with other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ogre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful phone and just what I expected. Also, if you purchase this for T-Mobile, which is what I did, you will be able to update the phone to Android 6.0 Marshmallow. The only problem I had with this otherwise excellent phone is that a small group of pixels in the middle of the screen are constantly brighter than the rest of the screen, which can be annoying but is tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: This phone lasted only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the phone and the fact that they shipped it to the post office to pick up and not the mailbox at the house. Worked well for a year, then one the chips went bad. The phone blacks out when you use it. Tried to reboot it and it has called 911 randomly each time. Not good. So I just leave it on all the time. So outdated that T Mobile is trying to get me to upgrade to at least a G6. I may need another sim card for that so not doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Muscatell

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality of the phone is good and features are decent
customer_reviews.text: Only had a phone for 1 year and 1 month and the phone went blue screen. The battery gets hot when you have multiple programs opened. The phone lags a lot and I have to restart at least once a day. The original battery that came with the phone cannot hold a charge for a full day. It will die within 3-4 hours with moderate usage (call, text, music streaming & social media). I had to buy a 3rd party battery for the phone and it held up its charge. Sound quality of the phone is good and features are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, too bad about t-mobile...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is pretty much perfect, great screen, great hardware, excellent design. The only downside is that the seller did not specify that the model was the t-mobile branded one, so in adittion to t-mobile bloatware (which appears to have included the upgrade to android 6.0) it has the unfortunate side effect of having the fm radio disabled, which is why I took off one star. Other than that I'm extremely happy with my pruchase, even more so now that I finally used the infrared port to create my own remote control. Simply magical.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M. De Negri

customer_reviews.title: Phones keep shutting themselves off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my husband and myself. They are constantly turning themselves off. I can't seem to get a hold of Amazon or the seller to figure out what to do. We have had them a few weeks now and at least twice a week while being used they just shut down. The battery is fine, the software is up to date they just stop working. I DO NOT recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Underrated phone. Still works to this day.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my mom one mother's day. Other than the battery starting to not hold charge for a long time this phone has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: IMHO this is the best phone out there for the money today
customer_reviews.text: IMHO this is the best phone out there for the money today. Things haven't really changed much in two more generations. This phone IS unlocked. I put my at&t sim card in and it works perfectly. Fast shipping and a question answered promptly.

customer_reviews.title: NOT REALLY UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: This only got two stars because the phone itself was in the condition expected and its a nice phone. However the product is advertised as unlocked but it only worked for a couple of months or so then suddenly I was unable to receive or make calls or use mobile data. The only up side is that the Wifi still works but what good is that really. I live in the Caribbean and although the phone says unlocked it acts as a locked phone and I have not been able to find a solution. I know of other people in the same situation with LGs. Unless you're willing to take that risk do not purchase this product.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like someone used cell phone before.

No update center. This cell phone must had this option. I tried update to lollipop and i didn't. Also tried used PC suite and i got the same, plus error message. Thirdly: Battery is very sucks. 5 or 6 hours and cell phone just gonna die. Fourthly: Screen, when i touched screen they had some defect.

customer_reviews.text: Meanwhile everything is good. The phone is working properly with the Israeli network (parthner) and the battery long life is surprising. The dealer is very responsive and answer all my questions. I even upgraded to Android marshmallow. The unsolved issue right now is with the waze (navigation APP) . For some reason I don't have sound when waze is working and the Bluetooth is on. But that's really the only issue which i believe I can solve.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for a decent price. This one's a keeper

It has a great feel in hands - light, almost seems to conform to your palms as well - despite the size. I love it and the Smart features are really cool. Overall I really love the phone. Great value in my opinion. Keeper for a long time

customer_reviews.title: I am new to android but can defiantly say it is a good product. The camera is very impressive especially the ...
customer_reviews.text: The LG arrived very fast, it was sealed. I am new to android but can defiantly say it is a good product. The camera is very impressive especially the Video. I had Iphone before, the Iphone fluent user interface is very addictive. However, There is no real comparison between the two products, The LG is like a ballistic missal and has the capabilities to do much more than the Iphone. I love the LG Swift Keyboard it is amazing. Battery life on the LG is a bit disappointing but i heard that after longer use it is getting better.

After just so much use it will just begin to fail. There are better phones for the price out there. The screen will flicker and fade and eventually just go out. Would not recommend.

The seller sent me raplacement batteries and they seemed to work fine just than, but after a few months the problem re-appeared. I tryed everything that was recommended as a solutiin, but nothing seems to help.

customer_reviews.text: After about a year the phone started to fell apart. It's not just this, but LGs aren't very good. For a while this was working good, until it started to malfunction.

The only complain is that it stated in "like-new" condition but it had a back cover with the Verizon 4GLTE with tiny scratches on edges, which made the product suspicious. In fact, SIM Cards were never recognized by phone. It was a useless phone.

customer_reviews.text: Phone's are not new eve though the seller claimed it was!!! I've had the phone for almost a year and always had an issue with putting on a screen protector that I couldn't understand. When I finally went to a store to take care of another issue they opened the phone and told me that it was refurbished and not even that well, the inner insulation was done poorly and dust got in and damaged one of the sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.Too late for refund
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked fine until this first week in August 2016.I used it successfully on the Tmobile network since receiving it in October 2015. Now it will not start.It gets hot right away in the area of the camera buttons on the back of the phone.

customer_reviews.text: 1- its unlocked but not from the factory 2- usb cable & earbuds are not original 3- left side of the screen has a space 4- didn't come in original packaging.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the G3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wanting a NEW phone as a replacement for my previous damaged G2 and it was new. I really like the G3. Very nice fast phone with the unbeatable LG camera. As promised....Ima happy camper.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, i love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone. Works fine in Venezuela with movistar. There is only one detail, the wall charger that came with the phone is european, so it came with an adapter that does not fit correctly, so the charger remains loose while charging. But everything else is fine.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition, amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Received the device new condition, sealed and new items like charger, cord, and battery. Works perfectly and beyond my expectations. Also got it earlier then the predicted delivery date!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on July 18th 2016. Today is October 30th 2016. The screen has stopped working and it just stays black. This phone worked for less than 3 1/2 months. Don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: this phone supposedly takes SIM card but within short time, found defective SIM card reader.I shouldn't pay anything for this phone.

customer_reviews.title: Good specs
customer_reviews.text: Specs are good. Battery life is average for light phone user. Not sure if it is unlocked as T-Mobile pushes updates automatically.

customer_reviews.title: BAD UNLOCKED CELLPHONE
customer_reviews.text: Battery is too hot no matter what then if it too hot it's drain the power within one minute. This is too bad already you don't have to mention about something else because battery is very important to telephone. Don't buy it not even worth a cent. too bad then this unlocked phone is no warranty even worse. I wasted my $200.00 . DON'T BUY IT. You don't have to read other review, this is enough
customer_reviews.author: nongnuj

customer_reviews.title: The phone was good in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: This phone phone is okay. I bought mine back in October of 2015. The phone was good in the beginning, but eventually the battery started getting really lousy, overheating, the phone started freezing and crashing too. It's a decent phone, but it won't really last you too long, especially if the battery starts to mess up. However, its display is nice and the camera is decent. Not bad for an LG.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. I had to upgrade to get full functionality on my network, and this phone is great.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Separate Battery
customer_reviews.text: The phone on the whole is pretty good. However, the battery that came with it consistently died at 30%. I basically could use it for 2 hours before it would die. But I bought an extended battery separately, and now the phone lasts all day and operates fairly smoothly.

But after using 5 months, This phone sometimes shut down immediately although I do not restart or using any strange apps. I reset phone and erased everything, this fault have still repeated. I bought it when I was in usa. Now, I comeback to my hometown. What should I do now? I'm so worry.

They will sell you faulty phones and then it stops working and you'll be at a loss. this phones keeps restarting every other hour.....Factory fault? but no warranty means, no changing. and then I bought another similar with warranty...and works just fine. it has never restarted

customer_reviews.text: The phone came permanently locked. That means that it cannot be unlocked unless tmobile, which is the company linked to the phone, helps me out. So far i had to open an account with tmobile because i did not have any phone and it just was an emergency. On the other hand the phone works well.

customer_reviews.text: Seller sold me a defective model and obviously didn't test this first. Phone shuts off after 2 min of use and only comes back on if you wait 5 minutes. Even at 100% battery. Hopefully the seller can replace it. Stay tuned for updated review on seller.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. The internal amount of memory is great. I have a bunch of apps and games on my phone and it isn't even half way used up.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: screen with a lot of moisture that won't go away and scratches really easily. Battery drains too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks refurbished, screen with a lot of moisture that won't go away and scratches really easily. Battery drains too quickly. I wouldn't recommend buying it to anybody.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as pefect as described. I would highly recommend buying from here, highly professional and swift with any questions or concers you may have. I give this business two thumbs up (:

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely LOVE this phone! It works amazingly. I used to have iPhone and though they were the best until LG came up with this great smart phone. Not a lot of people have it.. (which I understand why, because it is simply fantastic) and it makes it more special. I am really in love with this phone. 10 Stars for the seller and Amazon who delivered the item on time and with perfect packaging.

customer_reviews.title: The phone is really good, It charges fast
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for about a week now. The phone is really good, It charges fast, it performs fast, and it doesn't lag. I just wish the battery was a little better, but overall amazing phone.

customer_reviews.title: On random occasions the screen starts to flicker and fades ...
customer_reviews.text: On random occasions the screen starts to flicker and fades to darkness, or the screen just turns black. I read on the Android Central Forum that this is a common problem with the LG G3 that seem to be hardware related. So nothing you can do about it aside from returning the device to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this phone would be new when I bought it, like it said, but I was sent a refurbished phone. The phone wouldn't charge, it would glitch out all the time. I would recommend not buying a phone from this.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from IB Wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second LG G3 from another seller (IB Wireless) and the phone is defective out of the box. Battery discharges at rate of 1% per minute and phone overheats and touchscreen is untesponsive at times.

customer_reviews.title: ... the phone for almost two weeks and it works great. It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone for almost two weeks and it works great. It is easy to use. It holds its charge. The price is great for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Continuous restarting - don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this phone for 2 months. Now, all the phone does is restart continuously. If the phone is not charging, it's is non-functional! The phone will restart to the extent where you are not even able to unlock the phone to make a call or send a message - all you see is the phone restarting. This is very inconvenient - I definitely don't think I got what I paid for. I am extremely disappointed. I do not recommend buying this phone from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only rating 1 star because out of the box the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only rating 1 star because out of the box the phone will not turn on or charge. I am returning and ordering another in hopes that maybe it's just a defective phone

product_meta.title: LG G3 D851 4G LTE, 32GB, (GSM Unlockedx200E;) Smartphone, Metallic Black
product_meta.description: Size:32 GB| Color:BlackClassic, Lightweight and Ergonomically Designed Want to take brighter, clearer pictures with your Smartphone? Then buy the LG G3 D855 (Titan Titan, 32GB) online from Amazon India. It is one of the high-end phones by LG that comes with highly advanced features. The phone features a 13 MP primary camera with Optical Image Stabilisation and Multi AF together with the Laser Auto Focus. It enables you to click spectacular images and record splendid quality videos. The 2.1 MP front camera facilitates video recording and also helps you in recording 1080p videos at 30 frames per second. If you want to feel the true depth of bass and high-pitch notes while playing your favourite music tracks, the phone’s 1W Speaker with Boost AMP does it for you. Adding more to your fun, the LG G3 D855 facilitates voice recording with its 2nd Microphone. Displays Images and Videos in High Resolution If you love playing games and watching movies on your phone, the LG G3 D855 is the ideal choice for you. Its 5.5 inches (13.97 cm) 4x Quad HD Display adds more fun to your multimedia experience. The phone also features Smart Notice, which examines your needs depending upon your phone’s behaviour. Like, it provides you with Call Log Based Reminder, Location Based Reminder, Smart Cleaning and much more. To help you quickly access your favourite apps, the LG G3 also features Circle Windows which helps keep the 6 most used apps in your phone together. Additionally, there’s the Knock Code, which awakens your phone by just tapping.
feature_bullets: Experience 4x the resolution of HD, with a 5.5" Quad HD screen
Capture crisp photos using a 13 MP camera with Laser Auto Focus and Optical Image Stabilization (OIS)+
Feel the speed of a 2.5GHz Snapdragon quad-core processor AND 3GB RAM, 32GB ROM (user memory), 32GB (internal memory), Micro SD: 128GB up to 2TB
Quad Band GSM; LTE: 2, 4, 5, 7, 17; UMTS: Band I (2100), Band II (1900), Band IV (1700/2100), Band V (850)
Sync methods: WiFi, USB,4G Capable,4G LTE Capable,Wi-Fi and Mobile Calling
